name: Reverse Curl
how_to_perform:
1. Stand on the edge of a step or bench with your back to the edge, and hold dumbbells in each hand.
2. Engage your core by pulling your belly button towards your spine, and keep your back straight throughout the movement.
3.Slowerly lift your heels off the ground, keeping them elevated as you perform the curl movement. 
4. Keeping a slow pace, bend your knees slightly to lower your body just enough for your heels to be slightly in front of your toes. From this position, squeeze your shoulder blades together and draw your elbows back. Continue moving your dumbbells up along the sides of your legs towards your glutes.
5. Then  reverse the motion by bringing the dumbbells back down to the side of your legs using a smooth controlled movement.
short_summary: Reverse curls are an isolation exercise for the biceps.
